name: Pyramid port
script:
local t = mmp.getnums(multimatches[2][2])
if not t then return end

echo"\n"

if #t == 1 then
	cecho("<red>Porting to <orange_red>"..mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(t[1])].."<red>.")
else
	cecho("<red>Might be porting to <orange_red>"..mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(t[1])].."<red>.")
end
matches: Your hands become a blur as you twist and turn a paradox puzzle pyramid until each side is made up of the same colour, solving the puzzle in mere moments. Suddenly the image of

^Your hands become a blur as you twist and turn a paradox puzzle pyramid until each side is made up of the same colour, solving the puzzle in mere moments. Suddenly the image of (.*) appears in the back of your mind and you feel drawn towards it\.$
